name: Science City Kolkata
location: J.B.S Haldane Avenue, Mirania Gardens, East Topsia, Topsia, Kolkata, West Bengal, 700046, India

space_odyssey.name: Space Odyssey
space_odyssey.description: India's first large format theater with shows about space and astronomy. Now upgraded to a Fulldome 3D Digital Theatre with a 23-meter tilted dome.

dynamotion.name: Dynamotion Hall
dynamotion.description: Interactive hall with exhibits on illusions, motion, visual perception, energy, mechanics and other scientific principles.

evolution_park.name: Evolution Theme Park
evolution_park.description: Outdoor park tracing the story of evolution from big bang to modern humans with life-size animal models.

maritime_center.name: Maritime Center
maritime_center.description: Exhibits showcasing India's maritime heritage, shipping technology and oceanographic research.

earth_exploration.name: Earth Exploration Hall
earth_exploration.description: Two-storied hemispherical hall featuring exhibits on geography, climate, flora, fauna, and natural phenomena from different regions of the world.

Evolution of Life – A Dark Ride.name: Evolution of Life – A Dark Ride

Science on a Sphere.name: Science on a Sphere
Science on a Sphere.description: A 1.8 m diameter sphere with global datasets projected to show earth science, climate and astronomy phenomena.

facilities.parking: Ample parking is available for both cars and buses, with space for over 500 cars. The parking area is well-marked and easily accessible from the main entrance.
facilities.combo_offers: Various combo offers are available for different attractions and groups, allowing for a more cost-effective visit. These can often be purchased on-site or online.
facilities.food_and_beverages: Multiple food courts and snack bars are strategically located throughout the park, offering a variety of cuisines, including vegetarian and non-vegetarian options.
facilities.restrooms_and_first_aid: Clean and well-maintained restrooms are conveniently located throughout the complex. First-aid stations and on-site medical services are available for emergencies.
facilities.accessibility: Science City is wheelchair accessible with ramps and elevators. Wheelchairs can be rented at the entrance. Braille signage is available for visually impaired visitors.
facilities.guide_map: Available at the entrance and on the official website to help navigate the campus.

additional_info.operator: National Council of Science Museums (NCSM), Ministry of Culture, Government of India
additional_info.opening_date: 1 July 1997 (Science Centre & Park), Convention Centre from 21 December 1996
additional_info.footfall: Over 29.90 million visitors since opening (approx. 3.3 crore in 25 years)

convention_centre.booking_policy: Facilities available to scientific, cultural and professional organisations. Not available for private/social functions like weddings or birthdays.

tariff_and_terms.cancellation_policy: Refunds vary depending on notice period before the event.
general_conditions: Event organisers must comply with safety regulations and capacity limits.

climate_change_gallery.name: On the Edge?
special_features: Interactive wall for reducing greenhouse gas emissions

nearest_airport.name: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose International Airport (CCU)

nearest_bus_stand.name: Science City Bus Stop
nearest_bus_stand.routes: Connected by multiple WBTC and private buses via EM Bypass

how_to_reach.by_car: Located directly on EM Bypass, accessible from Park Circus, Ruby, and Salt Lake. Parking for 500+ vehicles available.
how_to_reach.app_cabs: Ola, Uber, and other app-based taxis drop at the main entrance.
